name: HireAbility.com, LLC
description: HireAbility is a leading world-wide provider of cloud-based CV, Resume and Job parsing technologies. Our resume parsing software is used by job boards, social networks, applicant tracking systems, vendor management systems, human resource systems, Universities, corporations social and professional networks, staffing companies and recruiters. HireAbility’s service works behind the scenes to help companies eliminate manual entry of CV / Resume increasing productivity and quality of data and providing the foundation for searching and matching resumes to jobs, resume to resumes, jobs to jobs and jobs to resumes. HireAbility's ALEX is multilingual and can parse resumes in over 50 languages and dialects worldwide.
features: Installed and hosted resume parsing solutions
Customization of resume and job parsing
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Parsing Resumes, Parsing CVs and Jobs in over 50 languages and dialects for the HR Software Industry for over 20 years!
ShortDescription: HireAbility is a leading world-wide provider of cloud-based CV, Resume and Job parsing technologies.

Highlights.name: HireAbility's Resume Parsing Software: ALEX
Highlights.description: HireAbility offers a resume parsing software called ALEX that can be integrated into your current workflow.

Highlights.name: Benefits of Using HireAbility's Resume Parsing Software
Highlights.description: The article mentions that using a resume parsing software can save time and improve the accuracy of your hiring process.

Highlights.name: GDPR Compliance.
Highlights.description: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) became effective on May 25th 2018. The purpose of the legislation was to give EU citizens greater control over the data that they provide online. As a data processor HireAbility does not store personally identifiable information and is 100% GDPR compliant. For more information on GDPR and how HireAbility maintains compliance please read our GDPR statement.

enhanced_description: HireAbility is a leading world-wide provider of cloud-based, installed, and hosted CV, Resume, and Job parsing technologies. Its core software, ALEX, is multilingual, capable of parsing resumes in over 50 languages and dialects worldwide. Serving the HR software industry for over 20 years, HireAbility's service integrates behind the scenes to eliminate manual data entry of CVs and resumes, thereby increasing productivity and data quality for companies. It provides foundational capabilities for semantic searching and matching of resumes to jobs, resumes to resumes, jobs to jobs, and jobs to resumes. HireAbility's solutions also offer customization of resume and job parsing. As a data processor, HireAbility is 100% GDPR compliant, designed not to store personally identifiable information.
key_use_cases: Automated parsing of CVs, resumes, and job descriptions
Eliminating manual data entry for candidate information
Improving data quality in HR and recruiting systems
Semantic search and matching of candidates to jobs
Semantic search and matching of jobs to candidates
Semantic matching of resumes to resumes
Semantic matching of jobs to jobs
Automating parts of the hiring process
competitive_advantages: Multilingual parsing capabilities (over 50 languages and dialects)
Customization of resume and job parsing
GDPR compliance for data processing (does not store personally identifiable information)
Supports both cloud-based, installed, and hosted deployment options
Proven experience with over 20 years in the HR software industry
implementation_scenarios: Integration with existing Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)
Integration with Human Resource Information Systems (HRIS)
Integration with job boards and social networks for candidate data ingestion
integration_capabilities: Integration with Human Resource Information Systems (HRIS)
roi_benefits: Increased productivity through elimination of manual data entry
